name: The Biggest Sword
description:
The Biggest Sword - game about swords.

You should stay alive how much it possible. You can improve your self by upgrading your Sword. Also every new level you can take new skill which will help you to fight longer.

Contollers:
WASD - movement
LCM - simple attack(lvl1-lvl2 swords)
RCM(holding) - powerfull attack if sword have this upgrade(stage 2 for swords 1-2lvl)
